name: Tricerat
description: Tricerat develops software to solve enterprise printing demands. I am currently a Tricerat software developer intern. I primarily develop C# WPF (MVVM) desktop applications that perform CRUD operations on databases, files, and registry keys.
tasks: Develop C# WPF applications with MVVM architecture
Implement desktop wireframe designs in WPF using XAML to enhance user experience
Setup virtual machines to test applications in multiple environments
Rapidly solve customer cases to increase customer satisfaction
